functions.name: MXTICKER
functions.description: Fetches specified compliance fields using a stock ticker.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Array of field names to fetch (e.g., {"Result", "Purification"}).

functions.name: MXISIN
functions.description: Fetches specified compliance fields using an ISIN code.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Array of field names to fetch (e.g., {"FTSE", "Zakatpershare"}).
